hunchback.name: Hunchback

corpse.name: Humanoid corpse
corpse.description: The body of a creature somewhat resembling a human, but with many subtle and horrific differences.

hunchback.description: What you can only assume is a hunched humanoid draped in tattered linens. Its face is completely concealed by a tapered hood. It chants in a gutteral language as it paces slowly.

brainraker.name: Brainraker

corpse.name: Brainraker corpse
corpse.description: The rubbery, lifeless form of a scaly humanoid. It seems to be slowly dissolving into the earth.

brainraker.description: A terrifying bipedal creature with a blue scaled hide and webbed hands. With every breath it exhales a shining mist of particles, covering its glyphed robe with miniscule crystals.
